titles.title: Saving Federal Dollars Through Better Use of Government Purchase and Travel Cards Act of 2015

A bill to provide for the identification and prevention of improper payments and the identification of strategic souring opportunities by reviewing and analyzing the use of Federal agency charge cards.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
